vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H4586H', 'matchingForm': 'מְעוּנִים', 'stepTransliteration': 'me.u.nim', 'gloss': 'Meunim', '_searchResultRange': 'Ezra.2.50-Neh.7.52', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '米烏寧', '_es_Gloss': 'Meunim', '_zh_Gloss': '米乌宁'}, {'strongNumber': 'H5984G', 'matchingForm': 'עַמּוֹנִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'am.mo.ni', 'gloss': 'Meunite', '_searchResultRange': '1Ch.4.41-2Ch@1Chr.4.41-2Chr.26.7', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞捫人', '_es_Gloss': 'Ammonita', '_zh_Gloss': '亚扪人'}, {'strongNumber': 'H5984H', 'matchingForm': 'עַמּוֹנִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'am.mo.ni', 'gloss': 'Ammon', '_searchResultRange': 'Deut.2.20-Neh.13.23@Gen.14.5-Zeph.2.9', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞捫人', '_es_Gloss': 'Ammonita', '_zh_Gloss': '亚扪人'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Meunit(?) of the Canaanites, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.41
Also named: am.mo.ni (עַמּוֹנִי "Meunite" H5984)
§ Mehunim or Meunim = "habitations"
1) a people who lived south of Canaan
2) a group of returning exiles, perhaps descendants of 1
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   pueblo; (b)   jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米烏尼 或 米烏寧 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "居所"
1) 住在迦南地南方的一個民族
2) 被擄回的一個群體,也許是1)的後裔
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米乌尼 或 米乌宁 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "居所"
1) 住在迦南地南方的一个民族
2) 被掳回的一个群体,也许是1)的后裔

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Mehun(?), first mentioned at Ezr.2.50
§ Mehunim or Meunim = "habitations"
1) a people who lived south of Canaan
2) a group of returning exiles, perhaps descendants of 1
